div.p: Yearbooks are a great way for you and your child to remember his/her year at Manawa Elementary School.Â If you would like to order a yearbook, please send the completed envelope that came with your child's report card along with payment of $13.00 to the school by May 1st.full article on YEARBOOK ORDERS

img.p: April is Autism Awareness Month!Â To celebrate the School District of Manawa is holding a coloring contest.Â Attached you will find the graphic for the contest.Â Simply color and submit...full article on Autism Awareness Coloring Contest
